textContent:
---more ways to describe how much i miss you---

I miss you so much! Gah! I keep repeating it over and over again but somehow the words don't feel enough to convey how much I miss you. 

I'm writing this while you are still sleeping on your day off. I finished work early today (didn't even take an hour. I love my job.), and I keep looking through our pics and some of the screenshots of our convos and Jesus Christ, I missed you even more.

I miss you like how every leaf longs for sunlight.

I miss you like how an owl yearns for the night sky.

I know you'll come back. But I miss you nonetheless. I know you'll stay. But I miss you all the same.

I miss you, Rei.
title: January 29, 2024
textContentHtml:
---more ways to describe how much i miss you---


I miss you so much! Gah! I keep repeating it over and over again but somehow the words don't feel enough to convey how much I miss you. 


I'm writing this while you are still sleeping on your day off. I finished work early today (didn't even take an hour. I love my job.), and I keep looking through our pics and some of the screenshots of our convos and Jesus Christ, I missed you even more.


I miss you like how every leaf longs for sunlight.


I miss you like how an owl yearns for the night sky.


I know you'll come back. But I miss you nonetheless. I know you'll stay. But I miss you all the same.


I miss you, Rei.
